name: Nahara's Journey
description:
The game tells a story about one female Arctic wolf and its pup, and the effects of climate change and human involvement which follow them along their journey of finding the rest of their pack.

This game is made for my third-year assignment as a part of my assessment for the narrative design module at the University of East London.

Controls:

- WASD for movement

- E and Space for interaction

- Mouse for camera rotation
